fields.tip: To create a custom input mask, you will need to use a specific set of characters.
fields.tooltip: An input mask helps to ensure a predefined format. It can be useful for zip codes, card numbers, and phone numbers. For example, the mask +09 (999) 999-9999 becomes +12 (123) 123-1234 on a form.

validation.errorMessage: You must add at least one 0 or one 9.
